page.title: 02SOCIAL EVENTS AROUND BERROW
page.content: This area having a small scattered population, social{events}and{clubs include people from neighbouring parishes. There is a Welcome Club for senior citizens, and a branch of the Women's Institute, both of which meet one afternoon a month, and an Old Time Dancing Club. Sources of{entertainment include a monthly whist drive, Harvest Supper, occasional Bingo and social evenings,all of which use the Church Hall. There are also church fetes. Other opportunities to meet are coffee evenings and mornings at private homes to raise money for various causes. {Recreational}facilities are few- keep fit classes sometimes- and people have to go to nearby towns for sport or theatre etc. Many people garden, some walk on the Malvern Hills. Some child- ren ride ponies and the Ledbury Hunt covers this area.
